estimate trialwise betas for an fMRI dataset.

Source: R/fmri_betas.R
estimate_betas.fmri_dataset.Rd

estimate trialwise betas for an fMRI dataset.

# S3 method for fmri_dataset
estimate_betas(
  dataset,
  fixed,
  ran,
  block,
  method = c("mixed", "pls", "pls_searchlight", "pls_global"),
  basemod = NULL,
  radius = 8,
  niter = 8,
  ncomp = 4,
  lambda = 0.01
)

Arguments

dataset

the fmri_dataset instance
fixed

the fixed factors
ran

the random (trialwise) factors
block

the block factor
basemod

baseline_model instance to regress out of data before bet estimation
niter

number of searchlight iterations for method "pls_searchlight"
ncomp

number of pls components for method "pls" and "pls_searchlight" and "pls_global"
lambda

lambda parameter (not currently used)

Examples


facedes <- read.table(system.file("extdata", "face_design.txt", package = "fmrireg"), header=TRUE)
facesdes$frun <- factor(facedes$run)

#> Error in facesdes$frun <- factor(facedes$run): object 'facesdes' not found
scans <- paste0("rscan0", 1:6, ".nii")

dset <- fmri_dataset(scans=scans,mask="mask.nii",TR=1.5,run_length=rep(436,6),event_table=facedes)
fixed = onset ~ hrf(run)
ran = onset ~ trialwise()
block = ~ run
